title: Is Theodore Roosevelt, Mississippi City, a "builder'to force him to fire a black postmaster?
subtitle: The President responded when Minnie Cox was pushed off site by the white population of Indiana.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: In 1903, Theodore Roosevelt closed the Post Office in Indianala, Mississippi, and the local mail was redirected after the city residents forced the local mail manager Minnie Cox out because she was black.
